Control Name: Security Incident Procedures  Response and Reporting - 164.308(a)(6)(ii)
Control Statement: Identify and respond to suspected or known security incidents; mitigate, to the extent practicable, harmful effects of security incidents that are known to the covered entity or business associate; and document security incidents and their outcomes.
